content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your electrical needs today? May I have your name to better serve you?
Hi, it's Ed Patterson. I do need some electrical work, but I'm swamped this entire month. I won't have time for an appointment.

Thank you, Ed. I understand being busy! If it helps, I can hold a spot for you in the future, or reach out next month to see if your schedule is clearer. Would you prefer to schedule ahead or wait until you have more time?
Let's just wait until later. I won't be able to commit to anything right now.
No problem, Ed. I'll make a note to check in with you at a later date. If you need service sooner or your schedule opens up, just let us know. Have a great day!
reason: Customer is too busy to schedule this month.
